Manifest shadows are the strongest variant of the shadow creatures that can be killed near the light rift within the Amlodd Clan district in Prifddinas. These creatures may be assigned as a Slayer task by Morvran and Laniakea.

When the Voice of Seren is active in the Amlodd district, these creatures have a chance to spawn a Chronicle fragment when killed. Players with the Harmony of Naragun perk from Memorial to Guthix activated will get a Guthixian Butterfly spawned instead. If a Chronicle fragment spawns, nothing else will be dropped.

Players with a Tirannwn quiver 2 or higher will have a permanent 5% damage buff against all shadow creatures. It does not need to be equipped.

Rare drop table[edit | edit source]

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • ninja 25 April 2016 (Update):
    • Improved respawn rates for Amlodd shadows.
  • ninja 5 January 2015 (Update):
    • Amlodd shadow pet parts now display a loot beam.
  • update 10 November 2014 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • As of 1 February 2018, the highest kill count for these monsters was 269,835 kills, shared with truthful and blissful shadows.[2]
    • This had increased to 434,917 by 6 May 2018.[3]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Rowley's Twitter account. 19 November 2014. (Archived from the original on 27 January 2019.) Mod Rowley: "Dark soul from truthful (1/1000), dark mind from blissful (1/2000), dark body from manifest (1/3000)." In response to the question: "What are the drop rates on the Eddie pet and the dark core pieces for Penny. Also why is Eddie only dropped by the big ones :("
  2. ^ Mod Shauny. Top 10 killers per Slayer Creature. Reddit. 2 February 2018. (Archived from the original on 28 February 2020.) Mod Shauny: "Here are the top 10 kills for each Slayer creature in RuneScape, be aware that we've not listed display names for privacy purposes however if you wish to brag about one number being yours then we won't stop you!"
  3. ^ Mod Shauny. Top Slayer Killers - 6th May 2018. Reddit. 6 May 2018. (Archived from the original on 28 February 2020.) Mod Shauny: "Here are the top 10 kills for each Slayer creature in RuneScape, be aware that we've not listed display names for privacy purposes however if you wish to brag about one number being yours then we won't stop you!"
